org.jhove2.module.format.sgml
Class OpenSpWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.module.format.sgml.OpenSpWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
SgmlParser
public class OpenSpWrapper
extends Object
implements SgmlParser

Wrapper around OpenSP SGML parser and onsgmlNorm utility. After the SGML file is parsed by OpenSp the output (in ESIS format) is parsed using an ANTLR-generated Java parser class. The grammar has been decorated with Java members and methods to accumulate information about the features of interest in the SGML file. The grammar accepts the OpenSP indication as to whether or not the SGML instance conforms to its DTD, and hence is to be considered valid. No DOCTYPE information is returned in the ESIS file. If the SGML module is configured to ask for doctype, then we run the onsgml "normalization" utility, and extract the doctype from the first line of its output.

Author:
smorrissey

parseFile

public SgmlDocumentProperties parseFile(SgmlModule sgm,
                                        JHOVE2 jhove2,
                                        Source source)
                                 throws JHOVE2Exception
Invokes onsmgls processor to parse and validate the SGML source. Then invokes ANTLR-generated parser to accumulate feature information about the instance

Specified by:
parseFile in interface SgmlParser
Parameters:
sgm - SgmlModule instance invoking this method; module will have Source member
jhove2 - Application framework with configuratin information
source - Source to be parsed
Returns:
SgmlDocumentProperties with features extracted by parser
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception

parseSgmlFile

protected String[] parseSgmlFile(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                                 Source source,
                                 String tempFileSuffix,
                                 String openSpCommand,
                                 String commandParms,
                                 SgmlModule sgmlModule)
                          throws JHOVE2Exception
Apply an OpenSp utility (onsmgls, sgmlnorm) to the SGML file

Parameters:
jhove2 - Framework with configuration information
source - Source to be parsed
tempFileSuffix - base suffix for onsgmls output and error temp files
openSpCommand - String containing full path to OpenSp command
commandParms - string containing parameters for OpenSp command
sgmlModule - sgml Module to which messages can be attached
Returns:
String[] containing path to .out and .err files Paths will be null if ExternalProcessor resulted in error
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception
IOException
NoSuchShellEnvException
